metadata.title: Add TinyClaw - Autonomous AI Companion Framework (Bun/TypeScript)
metadata.description: Adds TinyClaw — an autonomous AI companion framework built natively on Bun/TypeScript with Svelte 5 frontend. Features self-improving memory, smart LLM provider routing, plugin architecture, built-in security enforcement, and a Discord-like web UI. No official Docker image — stack builds from source.
metadata.author: Antigravity

operations.description: Add TinyClaw as a compose stack built from source (no official Docker image)

template.title: TinyClaw
template.name: tinyclaw
template.description: Autonomous AI companion framework with 'tiny core, plugin everything' architecture. Built natively on Bun (TypeScript/Svelte 5). Features self-improving memory, smart LLM provider routing, built-in security enforcement, and a Discord-like web UI on port 3000. Supports Ollama Cloud (free tier) and any OpenAI-compatible provider. Non-root container (user: tinyclaw, UID 1001). Pre-release / active development.

env.name: PORT
env.label: HTTP Port
env.description: Port for the TinyClaw web UI and REST API.

env.name: TINYCLAW_DATA_DIR
env.label: Data Directory
env.description: Persistent storage path for SQLite database, plugins, and configuration.

template.note:
TinyClaw nie posiada oficjalnego obrazu Docker. Stack buduje ze źródeł z GitHub podczas pierwszego wdrożenia. Projekt jest w fazie pre-release — API może ulec zmianie.

docker-compose.yml
services:
  tinyclaw:
    build:
      context: https://github.com/warengonzaga/tinyclaw.git
    container_name: tinyclaw
    environment:
      - PORT=${PORT:-3000}
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - TINYCLAW_DATA_DIR=/data
    ports:
      - "${PORT:-3000}:3000"
    volumes:
      - tinyclaw_data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "bun", "-e",
        "fetch('http://localhost:'+(process.env.PORT||'3000')+'/api/health').then(r=>r.ok||process.exit(1))"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 3

volumes:
  tinyclaw_data:

Po pierwszym uruchomieniu otwórz http://<host>:3000 — konfiguracja dostawcy LLM i połączeń odbywa się przez web UI (nie jest wymagany żaden plik konfiguracyjny z góry).
